name: TENA Slip Maxi Diapers (L)
description:
Patient is a 39 years old female who is bed-bound and uncommunicative since 2018. She is married with a four-year old son. Patient’s husband is unemployed as he is the full-time caregiver for her. Patient uses about 4 to 6 diapers per day and family has difficulty affording the diapers usage due to husband’s unemployment. 
Brand of diapers: Tena Slip Maxi Adult Diapers (Size L). It can be found here: https://bit.ly/3qdondW (Pinkpharm) or https://bit.ly/3qgkqp2 (Lazada). 
Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can contact me at 82479135 via WhatsApp. Thank you!

name: Blood Glucose Meter
description: Client is an elderly person with multiple medical conditions. She is unemployed and is unable to afford a blood sugar measuring meter to monitor her blood sugar level

name: Lifree Diapers (XL)
description:
Client struggling with medical issues that cause her to dependent on diapers. Due to lack of funds, she is unable to get the correct quantity of diapers - hence limiting her mobility.
She lives with her husband, who also has medical issues and cannot work, living in a rental unit with financial assistance. Looking for donations of XL size Lifree Pull up diapers to assist family.

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: ART kit
description:
For clients from low-income family with children of age 5 -21 years old. With more testing needed during the current phase, low-income families would have difficulties affording more test kits, especially families with many children or families with young and old.

Donor could send the test kit to SHINE Children & Youth Services (Clementi):
329 Clementi Ave 2, 
#01-248, 
Singapore 120329

name: King-sized Mattress
description: Family consists of a single mother living with 4 children and 2 grandchildren in a rental flat. They require an immediate replacement of a king-sized mattress. In-kind donation of 1 brand-new mattress will be appreciated. Family prefers brand new mattress due to sensitive skin conditions. Thank you.

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description: A single parent with a school going child requires a kitchen cabinet with a countertop as her existing one is quite worn out. A kitchen cabinet would help the family to be able to keep their pots and pans in a proper place as family resides in a rental flat with limited space.

contact.name: Chua Bee Guet

name: Cupboard
description: My client needs a cupboard to hang his clothes. He has not been working for more than 20 years due to his health. He lives in a rental flat

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description: Client is an elderly residing with her 11-year-old grandson in a rental flat. Due to a recent decline in her health, she is no longer able to work to support the household financially. Her current kitchen cabinet is faulty and she therefore requires an appropriate space to place her dishware and other household necessities. Given her financial situation, she is unable to afford the replacement. She and her grandson would greatly benefit from it to improve the state of their rental unit and their quality of life.

name: Kitchen Rack
description: Client is 60plus who is staying alone in a rental flat. Client has to throw away her kitchen rack which was infested by bugs. Client prefers to cook for herself than buying outside food.

name: Kitchen Rack
description: Client is a single mother of 3 young children age between 3 to 8 years old. Client and her children had suffered a period of homelessness and have not have a stable housing for the past 8 years. In late September, HDB has allocated them a rental unit. As this is client’s first home, she does not have the necessities and furniture for her house. Unfortunately, she had also left her job as a cleaner recently as she had to look after her children when they fall ill often. Client is dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office and she is also looking for a suitable employment now.

name: Wardrobe (3door)
description: Client is divorced with one child young child 12 years old. She just gotten her rental flat recently and would appreciate some donations to help her furnish her flat’s basic necessities. Thank you so much.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Simranjit Kaur

name: Sliding door wardrobe
description:
Low-income single parent family with 2 school-going children is looking for a replacement of their current donated wardrobe which is faulty. Sliding door preferred due to limitation in space as family stays in a rental flat.

Max: 90 × 50 × 192cm

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lee Yan Jun

name: Food ration
description: A 50s couple living in their rental flat. Husband is unable to work due to post hip surgery recovery. Wife is taking care of him. Couple requires halal food ration (e.g. rice, fresh vegetables and meats).

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Chua Pei Ching

name: Food Rations
description: A single male in his mid-40s struggling to secure stable employment and housing due to multiple health issues. He is struggling to fulfil 3 meals a day and would benefit from ready food rations.

name: Used functioning Iphone
description:
Single mother caring for 2 teenagers. Mother has mental health issue receiving treatment and long term financial assistance. Family is unable to afford to replace an Iphone for one of the teenager lost Iphone. Requesting for donation of a used functioning Iphone (with charger and USB cable included) for the teenager.
Interested donors may whatsapp me. Thank you!

name: Incontinence Sheets
description:
Patient is a 79 year old male who is married with a son. He requires assistance with his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient’s son is unemployed as he is the main caregiver for patient. Patient requires the use of incontinence sheets on a long-term basis, and he uses about 2 pieces daily. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing medical consumables due to son’s unemployment.
The item can be found here: https://www.lazada.sg/products/carton-sale-xl-size-ultra-absorbent-elderly-incontinence-maternity-bed-pee-pads-90x60cm-40pcs-i333438497-s719974557.html?spm=a2o42.searchlist.list.28.3e464850f14mT6&search=1&freeshipping=1 (Lazada)

name: Reusable bags
description:
Our centre is preparing to pack and distribute hampers in December. 
We'll require reusable bags (preferably medium to large size) to store the items. 

We're accepting second hand reusable bags that are in good condition.

name: Fresh food and grocery
description: Family has two young kids who requires fresh food and grocery as the family is facing financial difficulties due to some family issues. I will be able to provide the list of food. Thank you.

name: Food rations
description:
Young married couple is caring for a preschool child. Husband has lost his job recently and thus family has lost their main income. Looking for food rations to tide the family through a difficult time.

(Will specify type of rations, once contacted. Thank you)

name: balloons
description: We are looking for donation of cartoon balloons and helium to help cheer children in the hospital.

name: Toilet Training Seat
description: Ct is a single father who has a 4+ year old son. Ct is working part-time. Ct's son is not toilet trained yet, he avoids using the toilet as he is afraid of falling into the toilet bowl. Ct requests for a toilet training seat as it would reduce his son's fears greatly. Please contact Ms Tan Limin at 63260308 if you require further clarifications. Thank you!

name: Milk Powder (Similac Stage 3)
description: Family of 7, couple with 5 children requires short-term milk powder support. Father is the sole breadwinner and has not been working for the past one week as he was feeling unwell after vaccination. He works as a grab food delivery staff which affect the family financial situation. Wife is not working as she need to take care of the children at home.

name: Groceries
description:
Family with three children are facing financial difficulties and staying in a backpackers inn. They would require some groceries: Eggs, cheese, paratha, marigold milk, mineral water, F&N mango and apple juice. 

They would also need some stationery items for their children: Pencils, Markers, Mild liners, English notebook, artbook, sharpeners, paint brushes and paint (pastel colours).

A second-hand one is perfect!

name: Digital Camera
description: We are planning to conduct second run of photography group work. This run we are targetting at socially isolated and male seniors. We hope to tap on modality of photography as a platform to encourage participants to step out of their home, alleviate their anxieties and improve their quality of life. We would require 8 to 10 digital cameras (with charger)in mint condition. Please contact me at 96546514. Thank you.

name: Motorised scooter
description: An elderly client is requesting for a motorized scooter as his previous motorized scooter has broken down for a while and he is unable to walk with a steady gait after inserting 10 screws in his back and leg when he fell from the 2nd floor in 1989 when he was working as an aircon electrician. He is permanently unfit for work and requires a motorized scooter to allow him to travel further in place of his wheelchair as he feels very trapped and isolated in his rental unit.

name: 24 bottles X 361g Smucker's sugar free jam (assorted flavor)

The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. name: Merries Diapers Pants Size L
description:
A low income family is requesting for baby diapers specifically Merries brand for their toddler who is experiencing severe eczema.  
Wife is currently heavily pregnant and is due in Nov 2021. Husband is the sole breadwinner of the family and is a low income earner. The couple currently lives with their 1 yr old daughter, who has medical conditions involving her skin condition and requires special care. Their daughter has been in an out of hospital/clinics due to the skin condition and this strains the family's expensss further. Client plans to seek employment after her confinement ends to support the family. She used to work multiple jobs but currently is unemployed due to her pregnancy and caregiving issues for her toddler. With husband’s meagre income, they are unable to afford some of the basic necessities for their kids. The family is living in a 2 room rental unit. Hoping for kind donations for Merries Diapers Pants Size L (for 3 months worth).

Family needs at least 4 tins of 800g of similac stage 3 per month.

description: Looking for a hospital bed for one of our elderly residents who has suffered a stroke. She is currently on normal bed and it is difficult for our caregivers to provide assistance to her.

name: Commode
description: Family has a elderly aunt who recently got into a car accident and requires a commode for toileting urgently. She was previously the sole breadwinner and the family is unable to afford a new commode. Preferably foldable/collapsible as the flat toilet is small.

name: Foot Bike
description: Client has a medical condition which affects his mobility and is certified medically unfit for work. A foot bike will greatly benefit him as he can exercise at home to strengthen his leg muscles and mobility.

name: Motorized wheelchair
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr A, has recently been diagnosed with decompensated cardiac failure (disorder). The client ambulates around the community with his manual wheelchair, but due to his weak heart condition, it has affected his arms’ strength to push himself around. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a motorized wheelchair, foldable if possible, to assist Mr A on ambulating around the community. 
   
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Ave 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is not mobile due to the multiple health conditions, including a tumour in her knee. Being a mother of young children, it has been challenging for her to manage the household by herself. Her husband helps out at home but recently, he was diagnosed with arthritis and this had also affected his mobility. Due to the couple’s poor health, they have not been able to run errands and they are also not able to send their 4-year-old to school. There are concerns that the child’s development may be affected if she continues to not have the opportunity to attend school. There are no breadwinners in the family due to their health issues. They are heavily dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office to make ends meet. 

Mobility scooter (preferably for two passenger so that client’s husband can send their child to school)

name: Wheelchair Big Size
description: Elderly woman (73 years old) staying alone in Spooner Road, she needs a big size wheelchair for her to move about doing her daily chores.

name: Rollator
description: 70years old lady has limited mobility, she has to use wheelchair for long distances, she wants to have a rollator to practice walking so that she is able to walk more stably and be able to sit when she needs to rest.

name: Wheelchair
description: 65 years old Chinese female married and staying with her husband and daughter. Client is mostly homebound and is alone at home during the day, she experiences breathlessness whenever she ambulates in the Community. A wheelchair will help her to move around in the community.

name: Used Laptop x 2 pcs
description:
We are seeking of 2 used laptops.

One of the laptop, we hope to use and support one of our residents, who just recently completed program and continue with us for his rehabilitation. He is known as Jed Lim. He will be attending a few months course on agriculture that is conducted by NTUC learning hub.  

The second laptop will be for one of our existing staffs daughter. She will be using in her study. The staff, Mr Ang, has been with us for more than 10 years. He is an overcomer and exiting one of our operation staffs. 
We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. WE have total about 80 to 90 in house stay of residents and staffs. The Helping Hand is a Volunteer Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service.

name: Laptop
description:
The client suffers from mental health issues, and requires a laptop for 2 main reasons. First, he would need to utilize it for video counselling. Second, he needs it for his religious studies where most programmes have been moved online.

Interested donors kindly contact ruebenyue@carecorner.org.sg

She is working night shifts to earn some income, but does not earn enough to afford a new one.
